articles.title: Heading toward the Sun, Aditya-L1 mission camera took stunning image of Earth and Moon - HT Tech
articles.description: Aditya-L1 mission, India's first solar observatory, captured an image of Earth and Moon on its way to study the Sun's mysteries in this groundbreaking Sun project.

articles.title: Asia Predatory Lending Apps Claim Victims by Offering Easy Money - Bloomberg
articles.description: Authorities and tech companies are in a game of cat and mouse with criminals who use apps to extract sensitive information and money from people looking to borrow.
